```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(ggplot2)
```

## With Here

```{r cars}

data <- read.csv(here::here("data/travel.csv"))

ggplot(data) + geom_point(aes(x=ZipCode, y=MEAN_Total_Time))

```

## Without Here

```{r pressure}

data <- read.csv("data/travel.csv")
ggplot(data) + geom_point(aes(x=ZipCode, y=MEAN_Total_Time))


```
